text: Frederick McIver (born 14 February 1952) was an English professional footballer who played as a midfielder for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:People from Birtley, Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Sheffield Wednesday F.C. players Category:Gateshead United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Fred McIver
